amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete all funding from title I including $632 million for the Export-Import Bank, $32 million for OPIC, and $40 million for the Trade and Development Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 as printed in the Congressional Record to strike all the funds in title I of the bill which essentially eliminates all funding for Export and Investment Assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 40 - 387 (Roll no. 347).
